mapper.select: SELECT MSGID AS "msgid", MSGNO AS "msgno", MSGCODE AS "msgcode", MSGINFO AS "msginfo", BGCOLOR AS "bgcolor", FONTCOLOR AS "fontcolor", FONTSIZE AS "fontsize", SHOWAREA AS "showarea" FROM LED_MSG ORDER BY MSGCODE ASC

SELECT to_char(a.INSERTDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS FSSJ, a.LEDNO, a.LINENAME, a.ARRIVESTATIONCOUNT1 || '-' || ARRIVEYJD1 || '-' || ARRIVEBUSSTATE1 || ',' || ARRIVESTATIONCOUNT2 || '-' || ARRIVEYJD2 || '-' || ARRIVEBUSSTATE2 || ',' || ARRIVESTATIONCOUNT3 || '-' || ARRIVEYJD3 || '-' || ARRIVEBUSSTATE3 AS statestr FROM LED_MSG0906 a,(SELECT LEDNO,LINENAME,MAX(INSERTDATE) AS INSERTDATE FROM LED_MSG0906 GROUP BY LEDNO,LINENAME) b WHERE a.LEDNO = b.LEDNO AND a.LINENAME = b.LINENAME AND a.INSERTDATE = b.INSERTDATE AND a.LEDNO = #{ledno}

select t.glinecode as gline, t.linecode as xline, to_char(t.directoryflag) as fx, to_char(t.stationno) as xstation, to_char(t.gstationno) as gstation from v_tblinestation t where t.linename in ('106', '59') order by t.directoryflag, t.linecode, t.stationindex
